title: Strategies for Enhancing the Effectiveness of Technology-Based Teacher Development Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic digital educational tools
context.additional_context: For language education managers/leaders, this program focuses on strengthening competencies in designing and operating effective teacher development programs in smartphone-centered limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Participants can identify and explain core components of technology-based instructional development programs (e.g., feedback, analysis of best practices).
Participants can apply at least three effective instructional design strategies using smartphones in offline environments.
Participants can utilize instructional development skills acquired in language education settings in actual lectures at least 80% of the time.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
